title: Managing Partner
job_function: Human Resources, Business Development, and Supply Chain
company_industry: Technology, Information and Media, Financial Services, and Hospitality
description:
Join the leadership team at Antal International, a prestigious and forward-thinking recruitment network, specialising in providing global recruitment solutions. If you have entrepreneurial aspirations and dream of launching your own business one day, this could be your golden opportunity.
 



  





**About Us** 




 Founded in 1993, Antal International is a leading executive recruitment firm headquartered in the UK. Our global presence spans across 130+ countries.
 



  





**The Opportunity** 




 For the past 30 years, Antal has been fuelling the entrepreneurial passions of potential business owners. Professionals like yourself, from around the world, have utilized our support to establish and run successful recruitment enterprises. With our proven business model and practices, you can monetise your commercial knowledge and black book of contacts. All whilst managing your own lucrative recruitment firm and enjoying significant financial rewards, regardless of prior recruitment experience!
 



  





**The Criteria** 



* Background – A minimum of 5 to 10 years of corporate experience
* Commitment to full-time engagement
* Willingness to network & engage with clients directly
* Eagerness to learn and grow with a positive mindset
* A "can-do" attitude essential for a fulfilling entrepreneurial journey



  





**The Perks** 



* Join an esteemed international brand with a solid reputation
* Gain entry to over three decades of intellectual property (IP).
* With more than 1.5 million website visitors and over 780,000 candidate registrations in 2023, you can optimize your ability to attract both clients and candidates to your business.
* Complete transparency and access to our extensive database of global clients, totalling over 60,000 records.
* Connect with a global network of supportive, like-minded individuals, fostering collaboration and business opportunities
* Unlock unlimited earning potential generating substantial revenues of over 120,000 in the first TWELVE MONTHS and achieving work-life balance
* Continuously benefit from support in Training, PR & Marketing,
* Capitalise on Brand Exposure: Showcase yourself, your office, and your expertise to our social media community (with over 850,000 followers on LinkedIn)
* In-depth onboarding and training on the renowned and proven Antal Recruitment Methodology
* Continual Personal development with access to interactive online learning modules led by instructors: Permanent access to training and development resources through the Antal Intranet platform.
* Assistance with Office Setup and IT Infrastructure: Guidance on establishing your office and meeting IT and telecommunication needs and continuous access to a library of IT resources via the Intranet.
* Peer Support Network: Regular Collaborative sessions with offices specializing in various disciplines (such as Finance, Logistics, IT, Sales and Marketing, and Engineering) to discuss clients, and market trends, exchange ideas, offer advice, and share and explore business opportunities together.
* Promote your business and benefit by using a leading-edge chatbot to communicate with clients and candidates, seamlessly integrated across every page of Antal.com.
* Benefit from networking opportunities through participation in the Annual Global Conference, which brings together offices from around the world.
* Enjoy remote work, flexibility, and autonomy



  





**WE** 
 provide comprehensive training on all the core pillars of International Recruitment and further ongoing support. Take charge of creating and launching your firm, with operational management guidance provided by our experienced team.
 



**YOU** 
 bring your industry expertise and network, and
 **WE** 
 equip you with everything you need to excel in recruitment and entrepreneurship. Our winning combination includes providing all the tools, resources, coaching, business support, and marketing strategies.
 



  





**Apply NOW** 
 to explore this opportunity further and embark on the path to business ownership.

title: Engineering Manager - Experience
description:
We are seeking an experienced Engineering Manager to lead, mentor, and grow a team of engineers within the Experience Mission!
   

  

 Situated at the heart of the Content Platform R&D studio, the team is central to the ingestion, distribution, management, knowledge, and growth of all content experienced through Spotify products. The team is critical in managing this vast content ecosystem.
   

  

 We make crucial decisions impacting content appropriateness, availability, quality, and accuracy across Spotify. Using reactive and proactive mechanisms, we apply platform and business policies informed by content, user, financial, and experiential context, making decisions that benefit Creators, Consumers, and Spotify.
   

  

 You will be responsible for the team's execution, delivery, and overall health, ensuring they have the context, support, and autonomy needed to build impactful solutions for content management at Spotify. You’ll also support the organisation's culture and approach from a squad ownership model, with systems, problems, and expertise split by squad, to a product area-first model that emphasises cross-squad collaboration, higher-altitude problem solving, and a need for flexibility and adaptability.
   

  

 Working closely with Product Managers, peer Engineering Managers, and Staff Engineers, you will guide your team in developing, operating, and iterating on the systems that manage Spotify's content catalog. You will also play a key role in shaping your domain's product & engineering roadmap and strategy, ensuring alignment across competence, squads, the broader goals of Content Platform, and Spotify.
   

  

 What You'll Do
   

  

* Build, lead, and mentor a high-performing team, fostering their professional growth and career development through coaching, feedback, and performance management.
* Ensuring timely and high-quality delivery of projects that contribute to our objectives. Champion operational excellence and sound engineering practices.
* Partner with collaborators to define the vision, strategy, and roadmaps for problem domains, the Product Area, and your team while ensuring they align with business needs and technical opportunities (including the appropriate use of technologies like ML).
* Cultivate a healthy, collaborative, and inclusive environment where engineers feel empowered, challenged, and productive. Build strong relationships with partners across Spotify.
* Champion and cultivate a culture of adaptability and continuous evolution within your team and Product Area. Coach engineers and peers to navigate changing requirements, proactively identify and seize opportunities rather than waiting for perfect definition, and embrace a fluid, dynamic approach to problem-solving that moves beyond traditional squad boundaries to deliver impact where it's needed most.
* Provide technical guidance, ensuring the team makes sound architectural and technological choices. Facilitate discussions and decisions around building scalable, extensible, and reliable content management solutions.
* Effectively communicate team progress, challenges, and plans to partners across different levels and functions within the organisation, including management, peers, trust & safety teams, legal, and feature teams across Spotify.


 Who You Are
   

  

* You have proven experience managing and leading software engineering teams, including hiring, coaching, and performance management. Ideally, you are spending more energy coaching fellow managers and peers.
* You possess a strong technical background in software development, ideally with experience in backend systems, platform development, data processing, or large-scale distributed systems.
* You are passionate about people leadership and creating environments where engineers, engineering managers and product managers can thrive in a collaborative environment.
* You have excellent communication and collaboration skills, capable of working effectively with both technical and non-technical collaborators across multiple levels of seniority.
* You are experienced in engineering execution and feel that, as the engineering industry has shifted, there are other ways to solve problems than the traditional approaches.
* You demonstrate strong strategic and product thinking and the ability to align squad, PA and engineering goals with broader organisational objectives.
* You have a good understanding of system design, architecture, and operational concerns and are a proponent of iterative design, striking the right balance between the long-term and short-term solutions.
* While deep ML expertise is not required, an understanding of its concepts and applications, particularly in content analysis or decision-making systems, is a plus.


 Where You'll Be
   

  

* This role is based in Stockholm (Sweden) or London (UK).
* We offer you the flexibility to work where you work best! There will be some in person meetings, but still allows for flexibility to work from home.


 Today, we are the world’s most popular audio streaming subscription service.

title: Student Consultant – Innovation & Strategy Sprint
description:

title: Senior Testare
description:
Vi har nu ett nytt behov och söker därför en konsultkollega med nedan kvalifikationer. Tjänsten är en del av vår konsultverksamhet vilket innebär att du blir anställd av oss och arbetar hos kund alt. interna projekt och åtaganden.
   

  

**Jobbeskrivning**
* Automatisera och underhålla front-end tester med verktyg som TestCafe eller liknande.
* Skriva och läsa testkod i TypeScript.
* Dokumentera och planera tester i Zephyr eller motsvarande verktyg.
* Arbeta med kodhantering i Azure DevOps och delta i CI/CD-processer.


**Din profil (Skall krav)**
* Erfarenhet av att automatisera och underhålla tester för front-end med TestCafe eller liknande.
* Förmåga att läsa och skriva testkod i TypeScript.
* Erfarenhet av att arbeta med Azure DevOps eller motsvarande verktyg för kodhantering.
* Erfarenhet av att dokumentera och planera tester i Zephyr eller motsvarande verktyg.
* Flytande i svenska.


**Meriterande**
* Förståelse och erfarenhet av att arbeta med CI/CD-processer.
* Grundläggande kunskap om Git och erfarenhet av kommandoanvändning.
* Erfarenhet av Percy eller liknande verktyg för visuell testning.


**Sista ansökningdatum:** 
 29-05-2025
   

  

**Om Deploja**
 Vi sysselsätter idag erfarna konsulter, inom bl.a. Systemutveckling, Test, Arkitektur, IT-Projektledning, IT-Säkerhet.
   

  

 Att jobba på Deploja är något helt annat än att arbeta på ett vanligt konsultbolag – och det är vi riktigt stolta över. Vad är det då som gör oss unika?
   

  

 Vi erbjuder helt enkelt mer än bara hög lön och större frihet, det är bara början. Hos oss hittar du den arbetsmiljö och de möjligheter du förtjänar. Välkommen till Deploja, där gräset faktiskt är grönare!
   

  

**Vi erbjuder dig följande, Valet är ditt!**
 🚀 Spännande uppdrag hos våra många kunder. Vi fokuserar på långsiktiga uppdrag, vilket ger dig möjlighet att skapa värde för kunden samtidigt som du utvecklas själv.
   

  

 🌟 En trygg månadslön – tillsammans bestämmer vi en grundlön baserad på dina uppdrag.
   

  

 🚗 Tjänstebil – vi uppmuntrar dig att välja en elbil för en mer hållbar framtid.
   

  

 💼 Tjänstepension och stora möjligheter till löneväxling.
   

  

 🌴 Semester - Önskar du mer än 30 dagar semester, kanske 60 dagar?
   

  

 🏥 Privat sjukvårdsförsäkring, olycksfallsförsäkring och livförsäkring för ökad trygghet.
   

  

 📚 Kompetensutveckling – du får själv sätta din budget och välja vilka utbildningar du vill delta i.
   

  

 🕑 Livskvalitet - Har du kanske svårt att få ihop pusslet i vardagen och önskar arbeta lite mindre och ändå kunna tjäna lika mycket om inte mer?
   

  

* Vi hanterar ansökningar löpande, med hänsyn till höga arbetstrycket är det extra viktigt med en kort motivering för tjänsten som förklarar hur man möter kraven.

title: Senior Databasadministratör
description:
Vi har nu ett nytt behov och söker därför en konsultkollega med nedan kvalifikationer. Tjänsten är en del av vår konsultverksamhet vilket innebär att du blir anställd av oss och arbetar hos kund alt. interna projekt och åtaganden.
   

  

**Din profil (Skall krav)**
* Har minst 5 års erfarenhet som databasadministratör
* Har god erfarenhet av minst två av databasmotorerna Oracle, PostgreSQL och MySQL
* Har god erfarenhet av uppgradering, tuning och backup av databaser
* Har god erfarenhet av Git, Subversion, CVS, Mercurial eller motsvarande
* Har god erfarenhet av Linux
* Har god erfarenhet av att sätta upp klustrade miljöer


**Meriterande**
* Erfarenhet av xtrabackup
* Erfarenhet av Data Guard och Enterprise Manager
* Erfarenhet av Galera eller Oracle MySQL kluster
* Erfarenhet av PostgreSQL EDB primär/standby via EDB Failover Manager (EFM)
* Erfarenhet av Oracle RMAN och Postgres Barman
* Erfarenhet av Puppet
* Erfarenhet av agilt arbete


**Sista ansökningdatum:** 
 27-05-2025
   

  

**Om Deploja**

title: Teknisk Specialist
description:
**Frenda växer och befinner sig i en spännande fas av utveckling och lärande. Vi söker nu en teknisk specialist till vårt team som ska driva samverkan med våra största kunder och säkerställa att rätt saker blir gjorda på rätt sätt, tillsammans med leveransledare och projektledare.** 




  





 Vill du vara med och forma framtidens journalsystem för tandvården – i en roll där teknisk förståelse möter projektledning? Hos oss får du möjlighet att arbeta i en innovativ miljö som utvecklar en ledande, patientcentrerad SaaS-plattform för tandvården.
 



  





**Om Frenda** 




 Frenda startades 2017 och består idag av cirka 55 medarbetare med huvudkontor i centrala Stockholm. Vår vision är att vara den ledande plattformen för effektiv, säker och patientcentrerad tandvård. Vi brinner för att förbättra tandhälsan genom att skapa en enklare vardag för alla som arbetar inom tandvård.
 



  





 Vi är ett svenskt produktbolag som utvecklar och levererar en heltäckande molnbaserad SaaS-lösning inom MedTech. Vår plattform erbjuder en allt-i-ett-lösning för patienthantering, röntgen och bildbehandling samt lagring och säkerhetskopiering – specifikt anpassad för dentalbranschen.
 



 Hos Frenda värdesätter vi gemenskap och kontinuerlig utveckling. Vi satsar på våra medarbetare och skapar möjligheter för alla att växa inom företaget. Vår kultur präglas av en inkluderande och öppen atmosfär med snabba beslutsprocesser.
 



  





 Vi befinner oss i en expansiv fas där vi fortsätter ta marknadsandelar och utvecklas snabbt.
 



  





**Om rollen** 




 Som teknisk specialist får du en nyckelroll i våra mest komplexa kundprojekt. Du är länken mellan kundens behov och vår utvecklingsorganisation och ansvarar för att utreda och hantera tekniska frågor innan de går vidare till utvecklarna.
 



  





 Du har djup kunskap om produkten och driver tekniska utredningar för att skapa tydlighet kring vad som ska göras, både internt och i dialog med kunden. Det kan handla om att besvara frågor kring integrationer, reda ut tekniska beroenden eller säkerställa förutsättningarna för nya funktioner innan kravställning.
 



  





 I rollen samarbetar du nära leveransledare och projektledare, deltar i forum och möten med våra större kunder – både inom region och privat tandvård. Du kommer både arbeta självständigt och i team, med stort ansvar i projekt och kunddialoger.
 



  





 Eftersom rollen är ny söker vi dig som vill vara med och forma arbetssätt och skapa struktur. Du är van vid att ta ansvar, arbeta lösningsorienterat i komplexa miljöer och har ett stort tekniskt intresse. Det är också viktigt att du har god förståelse för hur digitala system fungerar i praktiken – gärna inom vård eller MedTech.
 



  





**Vi tror att du har:** 



* Flera års erfarenhet av tekniska projekt inom SaaS eller journalsystem
* Arbetat i roller där struktur, kommunikation och teknisk förståelse varit avgörande
* Erfarenhet av att arbeta nära kund, produkt och teknik och trivs i gränslandet däremellan
* Mycket god förståelse för hur digitala system fungerar i praktiken
* Goda kunskaper i svenska, både i tal och skrift



  





**Meriterande är om du har:** 



* Erfarenhet från tandvård, regioner eller implementering av journalsystem inom vård/MedTech
* Arbetat med databaser, integrationer eller liknande tekniska frågor



  





**Som person är du:** 



* Strukturerad och lösningsorienterad
* Nyfiken och vill förstå både teknik och verksamhet på djupet
* Van att arbeta i miljöer där inte allt är färdigdefinierat
* Trygg i samarbete med andra och skapar förtroende i dialog med både kund och kollegor



  





**Vi erbjuder:** 



* Möjlighet att påverka och växa i en spännande expansionsfas
* Flexibel arbetstid och möjlighet till hybridarbete
* Kollektivavtal och förmåner som friskvård, tjänstepension, sjukförsäkring och rabatterad lunch
* Kontinuerlig utveckling och samarbete med människor från olika bakgrunder



  





 Låter detta som något för dig? Vi ser fram emot att höra från dig och välkomnar dig till en roll där du får vara med och forma framtiden tillsammans med oss!

title: Account Executive - Sweden
description:
Are you ready to significantly impact the future of SaaS and telematics? Join ABAX Sweden as we expand our sales team and seek motivated Sales Representatives! 🚀
   

  

 You will play a crucial part in building and expanding our customer base. You will conduct engaging business meetings with potential customers you've identified through proactive prospecting, and you'll have the opportunity to negotiate and close contracts successfully. Your goal will be to create real business value by understanding our client's needs and challenges and presenting them with tailored products and solutions. You will take complete ownership of the sales process from start to finish.
   

  

 For your first 12 months, you'll own your customer portfolio, giving you the opportunity to enhance your earnings through upselling and cross-selling while nurturing valuable relationships. ⭐
   

  

 We are looking for a dynamic individual with sales experience, particularly in making first contact through cold calling, and who thrives in a target-driven environment. At ABAX, we believe in nurturing talent, and we are eager to connect with enthusiastic individuals who have the potential to become our next top sellers. We encourage all applicants to apply, regardless of their prior experience, as we are actively recruiting throughout our sales department. Join us in shaping a successful future together!⭐
   

  

**Some Of The Things You Will Be Working On**
* Identifying prospects, generating leads, and building pipelines for potential customers
* Booking and conducting client meetings
* Managing the entire sales process from initial contact to contract closure
* Working closely with the onboarding team ensuring a thorough onboarding journey for our new customer at ABAX
* Identify opportunities to upsell within the first 12 months of owning the customer and ensuring retention
* Utilize our reporting tools, CRM system, and sales training resources.


**We Believe You Bring**
* Demonstrated some experience in sales, preferably experience in cold sales and booking meetings.
* Ability to conduct effective business meetings.
* Thriving in a KPI metrics-driven environment, with a focus on achieving and exceeding performance targets
* Comfortable using Microsoft Office, CRM software, and other online tools
* Exceptional communication and networking abilities
* Proficient written, verbal, and presentation capabilities in Swedish


**Nice-to-have**
* Familiarity with SaaS, telematics, and mobility data solutions.


**Background Check And Reference Verification**
 Successful employment is contingent upon ABAX receiving satisfactory references.
   

  

 As part of our hiring process, we perform a digital reference check through RefApp, an advanced online solution for managing this procedure.
   

  

 Please be aware that a background check may be conducted simultaneously with the reference check.
   

  

**Equal Opportunities**
*At ABAX, we are dedicated to creating an inclusive environment for all our colleagues. This commitment extends to ensuring that our recruitment practices and processes are as inclusive as possible. We encourage applicants from all backgrounds to join us in strengthening our focus on equality and diversity in the workplace.*
**About ABAX**
 ABAX unlocks company data potential by translating the customers' needs into advanced technology solutions.
   

  

 ABAX is one of the largest telematics companies in Europe with solutions for mileage claims, tool tracking, and equipment control with over 500 000 tracked units all over the world. In 2020 ABAX started a journey expanding into developing mobility data solutions entering new verticals like insurance and leasing being the preferred mobility data provider for the B2B industry on a wider scale. ABAX solutions help our customers run their businesses smarter and more sustainable, making it easy to improve efficiency, comply with legislation, and increase profitability.
   

  

 We know happy employees equal happy customers, and we do our utmost to facilitate employee satisfaction, both in and out of work. We have around 300 employees spread across offices in nine countries. Our Headquarters and Tech Centre are situated in Larvik, on the southeast coast of Norway. Our values: Enthusiastic, Customer-centric, Innovative, and Sustainable form the foundation of our daily work, every hour of every day.

title: Delivery Consultant, ProServe EMEA North
description:
**Description**
 The Amazon Web Services Professional Services (ProServe) team is seeking a skilled Delivery Consultant to join our team at Amazon Web Services (AWS). In this role, you'll work closely with customers to design, implement, and manage AWS solutions that meet their technical requirements and business objectives. You'll be a key player in driving customer success through their cloud journey, providing technical expertise and best practices throughout the project lifecycle.
   

  

 Possessing a deep understanding of AWS products and services, as a Delivery Consultant you will be proficient in architecting complex, scalable, and secure solutions tailored to meet the specific needs of each customer. You’ll work closely with stakeholders to gather requirements, assess current infrastructure, and propose effective migration strategies to AWS. As trusted advisors to our customers, providing guidance on industry trends, emerging technologies, and innovative solutions, you will be responsible for leading the implementation process, ensuring adherence to best practices, optimizing performance, and managing risks throughout the project.
   

  

 The AWS Professional Services organization is a global team of experts that help customers realize their desired business outcomes when using the AWS Cloud. We work together with customer teams and the AWS Partner Network (APN) to execute enterprise cloud computing initiatives. Our team provides assistance through a collection of offerings which help customers achieve specific outcomes related to enterprise cloud adoption. We also deliver focused guidance through our global specialty practices, which cover a variety of solutions, technologies, and industries.
   

  

 Key job responsibilities
   

  

 As an experienced technology professional, you will be responsible for:
   

  

* Designing and implementing complex, scalable, and secure AWS solutions tailored to customer needs
* Providing technical guidance and troubleshooting support throughout project delivery
* Collaborating with stakeholders to gather requirements and propose effective migration strategies
* Acting as a trusted advisor to customers on industry trends and emerging technologies
* Sharing knowledge within the organization through mentoring, training, and creating reusable artifacts


**About The Team**
 Diverse Experiences: AWS values diverse experiences. Even if you do not meet all of the preferred qualifications and skills listed in the job below, we encourage candidates to apply. If your career is just starting, hasn’t followed a traditional path, or includes alternative experiences, don’t let it stop you from applying.
   

  

 Why AWS? Amazon Web Services (AWS) is the world’s most comprehensive and broadly adopted cloud platform. We pioneered cloud computing and never stopped innovating — that’s why customers from the most successful startups to Global 500 companies trust our robust suite of products and services to power their businesses.
   

  

 Inclusive Team Culture - Here at AWS, it’s in our nature to learn and be curious. Our employee-led affinity groups foster a culture of inclusion that empower us to be proud of our differences. Ongoing events and learning experiences, including our Conversations on Race and Ethnicity (CORE) conferences, inspire us to never stop embracing our uniqueness.
   

  

 Mentorship & Career Growth - We’re continuously raising our performance bar as we strive to become Earth’s Best Employer. That’s why you’ll find endless knowledge-sharing, mentorship and other career-advancing resources here to help you develop into a better-rounded professional.
   

  

 Work/Life Balance - We value work-life harmony. Achieving success at work should never come at the expense of sacrifices at home, which is why we strive for flexibility as part of our working culture. When we feel supported in the workplace and at home, there’s nothing we can’t achieve in the cloud.
   

  

**Basic Qualifications**
* Experience in cloud architecture and implementation
* Experience in cloud infrastructure
* Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Engineering, related field, or equivalent experience
* Swedish language


**Preferred Qualifications**
* AWS experience preferred, with proficiency in a wide range of AWS services (e.g., EC2, S3, RDS, Lambda, IAM, VPC, CloudFormation)
* AWS Professional level certifications (e.g., Solutions Architect Professional, DevOps Engineer Professional) preferred
* Experience with automation and scripting (e.g., Terraform, Python)
* Knowledge of security and compliance standards (e.g., HIPAA, GDPR)
* Strong communication skills with the ability to explain technical concepts to both technical and non-technical audiences


 Amazon is an equal opportunities employer. We believe passionately that employing a diverse workforce is central to our success. We make recruiting decisions based on your experience and skills. We value your passion to discover, invent, simplify and build. Protecting your privacy and the security of your data is a longstanding top priority for Amazon. Please consult our Privacy Notice (https://www.amazon.jobs/en/privacy\_page) to know more about how we collect, use and transfer the personal data of our candidates.
   

  

 Our inclusive culture empowers Amazonians to deliver the best results for our customers. If you have a disability and need a workplace accommodation or adjustment during the application and hiring process, including support for the interview or onboarding process, please visit https://amazon.jobs/content/en/how-we-hire/accommodations for more information. If the country/region you’re applying in isn’t listed, please contact your Recruiting Partner.
   

  

  

**Company** 
 - AWS EMEA SARL (Sweden Branch)
   

  

 Job ID: A2990860

 Job ID: A2990824

title: Delivery Consultant, ProServe EMEA North
description:
**Description**
 The Amazon Web Services Professional Services (ProServe) team is seeking a skilled Delivery Consultant to join our team at Amazon Web Services (AWS). In this role, you'll work closely with customers to design, implement, and manage AWS solutions that meet their technical requirements and business objectives. You'll be a key player in driving customer success through their cloud journey, providing technical expertise and best practices throughout the project lifecycle.
   

  

 Possessing a deep understanding of AWS products and services, as a Delivery Consultant you will be proficient in architecting complex, scalable, and secure solutions tailored to meet the specific needs of each customer. You’ll work closely with stakeholders to gather requirements, assess current infrastructure, and propose effective migration strategies to AWS. As trusted advisors to our customers, providing guidance on industry trends, emerging technologies, and innovative solutions, you will be responsible for leading the implementation process, ensuring adherence to best practices, optimizing performance, and managing risks throughout the project.
   

  

 The AWS Professional Services organization is a global team of experts that help customers realize their desired business outcomes when using the AWS Cloud. We work together with customer teams and the AWS Partner Network (APN) to execute enterprise cloud computing initiatives. Our team provides assistance through a collection of offerings which help customers achieve specific outcomes related to enterprise cloud adoption. We also deliver focused guidance through our global specialty practices, which cover a variety of solutions, technologies, and industries.
   

  

 Key job responsibilities
   

  

 As an experienced technology professional, you will be responsible for:
   

  

* Designing and implementing complex, scalable, and secure AWS solutions tailored to customer needs
* Providing technical guidance and troubleshooting support throughout project delivery
* Collaborating with stakeholders to gather requirements and propose effective migration strategies
* Acting as a trusted advisor to customers on industry trends and emerging technologies
* Sharing knowledge within the organization through mentoring, training, and creating reusable artifacts


**About The Team**
 Diverse Experiences: AWS values diverse experiences. Even if you do not meet all of the preferred qualifications and skills listed in the job below, we encourage candidates to apply. If your career is just starting, hasn’t followed a traditional path, or includes alternative experiences, don’t let it stop you from applying.
   

  

 Why AWS? Amazon Web Services (AWS) is the world’s most comprehensive and broadly adopted cloud platform. We pioneered cloud computing and never stopped innovating — that’s why customers from the most successful startups to Global 500 companies trust our robust suite of products and services to power their businesses.
   

  

 Inclusive Team Culture - Here at AWS, it’s in our nature to learn and be curious. Our employee-led affinity groups foster a culture of inclusion that empower us to be proud of our differences. Ongoing events and learning experiences, including our Conversations on Race and Ethnicity (CORE) and AmazeCon (gender diversity) conferences, inspire us to never stop embracing our uniqueness.
   

  

 Mentorship & Career Growth - We’re continuously raising our performance bar as we strive to become Earth’s Best Employer. That’s why you’ll find endless knowledge-sharing, mentorship and other career-advancing resources here to help you develop into a better-rounded professional.
   

  

 Work/Life Balance - We value work-life harmony. Achieving success at work should never come at the expense of sacrifices at home, which is why we strive for flexibility as part of our working culture. When we feel supported in the workplace and at home, there’s nothing we can’t achieve in the cloud.
   

  

**Basic Qualifications**
* Experience in cloud architecture and implementation
* Cloud infrastructure experience
* Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Engineering, related field, or equivalent experience
* Swedish language


**Preferred Qualifications**
* AWS experience preferred, with proficiency in a wide range of AWS services (e.g., EC2, S3, RDS, Lambda, IAM, VPC, CloudFormation)
* AWS Professional level certifications (e.g., Solutions Architect Professional, DevOps Engineer Professional) preferred
* Experience with automation and scripting (e.g., Terraform, Python)
* Knowledge of security and compliance standards (e.g., HIPAA, GDPR)
* Strong communication skills with the ability to explain technical concepts to both technical and non-technical audiences


 Amazon is an equal opportunities employer. We believe passionately that employing a diverse workforce is central to our success. We make recruiting decisions based on your experience and skills. We value your passion to discover, invent, simplify and build. Protecting your privacy and the security of your data is a longstanding top priority for Amazon.  Job ID: A2990833

title: Riksbanken söker Förvaltningsledare IT för området IT arbetsplats
description:
Riksbankens mål är att IT ska vara en strategisk partner till verksamheten och vi har höga ambitioner att ligga i framkant med vårt IT-stöd.
   

  

 Är du en ledare med teknisk erfarenhet och passion för IT? Vill du vara med och stärka Riksbankens förmåga genom att utveckla och implementera effektiva och säkra IT-lösningar? Vill du bidra till att forma och driva utvecklingen av IT i en spännande miljö där Sveriges ekonomiska utveckling står i fokus? Som förvaltningsledare IT på Riksbanken får du möjlighet att arbeta och utvecklas i en omgivning som få kan matcha.
   

  

 VI ERBJUDER
   

  

 Hos oss ges utmanande arbetsuppgifter i en händelserik miljö där Sveriges ekonomiska utveckling står i fokus. Vi har kunniga och engagerade kollegor och det finns stora möjligheter till kompetensutveckling.
   

  

 DET HÄR GÖR DU HOS OSS
   

  

 Riksbanken jobbar enligt förvaltningsstyrningsmodellen pm3 och som Förvaltningsledare IT ansvarar du för att utarbeta en förvaltningsplan för ditt förvaltningsobjekt och för att följa upp utfallet för IT-kostnader mot förvaltningsobjektets budget. Du prioriterar och beslutar vad som ska göras inom ramen för förvaltningsplanen för att verkställa planens IT-relaterade mål på ett kostnadseffektivt sätt, samt att lyfta eventuella risker till förvaltningsstyrgruppen.
   

  

 Som förvaltningsledare IT kommer du och teamet för förvaltningsobjektet IT-arbetsplats att driva vidareutvecklingen av Riksbankens IT-stöd och tjänster, detta i nära samarbete med interna kollegor, externa leverantörer och verksamheten. Tillsammans säkerställer ni att Riksbankens lösningar för IT-arbetsplats följer gällande regelverk, är moderna användarvänliga, effektiva och användbara för verksamheten. Det finns stor bredd och potential i rollen och du erbjuds också möjlighet att driva projekt med syfte att utöka och förbättra IT-stöd och tjänsteutbud inom området.
   

  

**Dina Ansvarsområden Omfattar**
* Styra, leda och följa upp förvaltningsarbetet.
* Ta fram förvaltningsplan samt att verkställa förvaltningsplanens mål inom givna ramar.
* Följa upp externa leverantörer, godkänna och följa upp leveranser.
* Vara ett stöd i bankens verksamhetsutveckling med hjälp av IT.
* Leda specifika projekt inom området.
* Omvärldsbevaka området vilket även kan innebära deltagande i vissa internationella forum.


 DITT TEAM
   

  

 Riksbankens IT-verksamhet leds av en IT-chef och består av sex enheter som leds av var sin enhetschef. Du tillhör enheten för arbetsplats och stödsystem. Vi driver Riksbankens digitala utveckling samtidigt som vi levererar en robust och säker förvaltning av hög kvalitet. Arbetet sker processorienterat enligt ITIL och IT-miljön innehåller flera samhällskritiska system. Riksbanken är inne i en förändringsresa och strävar efter att anamma ett mer agilt arbetssätt, som förvaltningsledare IT kommer du att delta i detta förändringsarbete.
   

  

 MER OM DIG
   

  

**Krav**
* Universitets- eller högskoleutbildning inom datavetenskap, systemvetenskap eller närliggande områden alternativt arbetslivserfarenhet som vi bedömer likvärdig.
* Minst 5 års praktisk erfarenhet av förvaltningsledning av lösningar utifrån ett IT- och teknikperspektiv..
* Minst 3 års praktisk erfarenhet av kravställning, utveckling och förvaltning inom dessa områden.
* God svenska och engelska i tal och skrift.


**Meriterande**
* Utbildning eller certifieringar inom Windows Server och Windows Client.
* Erfarenhet av säkerhetslösningar och härdning av klientoperativ.
* Erfarenhet av mjukvarupaketering och -distribution.
* Erfarenhet av test/certifiering samt produktlivscykelhantering av klienthårdvara, kringutrustning och mobiltelefoner.
* Erfarenhet av utskriftstjänster och hårdvara.
* Erfarenheter av lösningar för digital kommunikation.
* Erfarenhet av styrning och uppföljning av leverantörer.
* Erfarenhet av ITIL och pm3, projektledning och agila arbetsformer.
* Erfarenhet av upphandling av tjänster och produkter.
* Erfarenhet av arbete i samhällsviktig verksamhet med höga krav på tillgänglighet.


 För tjänsten lägger vi stor vikt vid personliga egenskaper. Eftersom denna roll innebär ett stort eget ansvar, är du initiativtagande samt mål- och resultatinriktad. Du besitter ledaregenskaper och är kundorienterad i ditt arbetssätt. Positiv, innovativ, drivande och strukturerad, med god analytisk förmåga, är egenskaper som du känner igen dig i. Du trivs med samarbete och har en mycket god kommunikationsförmåga.
   

  

 MER OM TJÄNSTEN
   

  

 Tillträde: Enligt överenskommelse
   

  

 Anställningstyp: Tillsvidareanställning
   

  

 Placering: Huvudkontoret Brunkebergstorg Stockholm
   

  

 Arbetstid: Förtroendearbetstid
   

  

 Möjlighet att jobba distans: 1 eller 2 dagar i veckan
   

  

 Förmåner: Generösa semestervillkor, löneväxling till pension, subventionerad lunch, friskvårdsbidrag, subventionerad massage och tillgång till gym och ledarledda träningspass.
   

  

 Tjänsten kan komma att placeras i säkerhetsklass och en säkerhetsprövning innefattande registerkontroll, säkerhetsprövningssamtal och särskild personutredning görs då för slutkandidaten. För vissa tjänster ställs krav på svenskt medborgarskap. Vi genomför också bakgrundskontroller på slutkandidaterna, vilket innebär att vi kontrollerar examensbevis eller annat dokument som styrker din utbildning.
   

  

 ATT JOBBA PÅ RIKSBANKEN
   

  

 Riksbanken är en myndighet under riksdagen som ser till att pengarna behåller sitt värde över tid och att betalningar kan ske säkert och effektivt. Vi ger också ut Sveriges sedlar och mynt. Vi arbetar på medborgarnas uppdrag för en stark och säker ekonomi.
   

  

 ANSÖK
   

  

 Vi vill ha din ansökan med CV senast den 9 juni. Vi vill att du i denna rekrytering besvarar ett antal urvalsfrågor. På så vis kan du enkelt söka tjänsten och vi ges möjligheten att utvärdera våra kandidater på lika villkor. Logiska tester och arbetsprov kan komma att ingå som en del av rekryteringsprocessen. Vi genomför också bakgrundskontroller på slutkandidaterna, vilket innebär att vi kontrollerar examensbevis eller annat dokument som styrker din utbildning.
   

  

 Vi ser fram emot att få kontakt med dig!

title: Founder Residency
company_industry: Venture Capital and Private Equity Principals
description:
**About** 




  





 Ready to build your startup and get funded in 10 weeks? We’re a global early-stage VC backing founders from day zero. We invest up to €400k through our founder residency – a building sprint where you leverage community, sparring, and intense effort to make 1 year of progress in 10 weeks.
 



  





 Join the next Nordics residency starting
 **September 1st, 2025** 
 . Build your company alongside a cohort of pre-vetted, exceptional potential co-founders, validate your ideas, engage with customers, develop your MVP, refine your business model, and create your go-to-market strategy before pitching to the investment committee.
 



  





**About You:** 




 We are looking for
 **Founders, CEOs, CTOs, and others** 
 eager to build the next disruptive tech venture from the ground up.
 


* **Founder DNA:** 
 The residency is built for fully-committed, full-time entrepreneurs (or will go full time by the point of the residency). You know what it means to be a founder and are ready to take it on for the right reasons. Grit, integrity, determination, commitment, humility, and resilience describe you.
* **Experience** 
 : Successful Antler Founders have a honed skill in addition to Founder DNA. Examples include sales, software development, product design, domain expertise, fundraising, etc. Many worked at startups as founders or employees in the past.
* **Industry Focus:** 
 Antler is industry agnostic, as seen in our portfolio of investments. Antler has invested in over 1,500+ companies to date across many industries. In the Nordics, we have an active portfolio size of >150 companies that is well-balanced across different sectors.



  





**The Antler Founder Residency:** 




 The residency starts on
 **September 1st, 2025,** 
 and runs for
 **10 weeks in Stockholm** 
 . Any adjustments have to be agreed to in the interview process.
 



 Our residency program is fairly unstructured, with 90%+ of the time focused dedicated to founders working on their companies and making week-over-week progress. Here are some examples of things that founders focus on, depending on where they are at in their company journey:
 



  




* Find and vet potential cofounders
* Validate core assumptions around your business ideas and find meaningful market insight
* Build prototypes, find design partners, launch pilots, close customers
* Get feedback from functional experts and dedicated coaches
* Reach milestones that align with pre-seed funding



  





 If founders have already accomplished any of the above, they dedicate their full effort on the next most important milestones.
 



  





**Antler Investment Process** 



* At the end of the 10-week residency, you will have the opportunity to present to the Antler Investment Committee. If approved by the investment committee, you will receive a pre-seed commitment of
 **€400,000** 
 in two tranches. €100k for 10% and €300k in follow-on capital.
* Companies that receive investment at the end of the residency will join the Antler portfolio and gain even higher touch programming from our partners. This includes access our network of downstream investors, integration into the Antler Nordics portfolio and global portfolio network, and introductions to relevant partners and discounted service providers.



  





**About Antler** 




 Antler is a early-stage VC that is changing the way people build companies. We operate in 30 locations worldwide, have supported 8,000+ founders through our residencies, and invested in 1500+ startups globally. We launched Antler to build a better on-ramp to venture capital. After working in venture-backed companies for years, we built Antler to provide founders with a structured and transparent process to successfully launch a new venture, a community for support throughout the experience, and a clear pathway to venture funding.
 



  





**Antler Highlights:** 




 Some examples of successful companies that were built as a result of Antler’s residency, received pre-seed investment from Antler, and have gone on to raise substantial investments are as follows:
 


* **Airalo:** 
 The world’s first eSIM subscription and top-up store
* **Wingbits** 
 : Incentive-based flight tracking platform
* **Treyd:** 
 Working capital operating system for B2B
* **Reebelo:** 
 Used electronics marketplace
* **Telgea:** 
 Global telecom operator
* **Glint Solar:** 
 Software for identifying the best solar sites faster



  





**Cohort starts: September 1st, 2025 but we work with founders all year around on an ad hoc basis.** 




  





**APPLY NOW**

title: Delivery Consultant, ProServe EMEA North
description:
**Description**
 The Amazon Web Services Professional Services (ProServe) team is seeking a skilled Delivery Consultant to join our team at Amazon Web Services (AWS). In this role, you'll work closely with customers to design, implement, and manage AWS solutions that meet their technical requirements and business objectives. You'll be a key player in driving customer success through their cloud journey, providing technical expertise and best practices throughout the project lifecycle.
   

  

 Possessing a deep understanding of AWS products and services, as a Delivery Consultant you will be proficient in architecting complex, scalable, and secure solutions tailored to meet the specific needs of each customer. You’ll work closely with stakeholders to gather requirements, assess current infrastructure, and propose effective migration strategies to AWS. As trusted advisors to our customers, providing guidance on industry trends, emerging technologies, and innovative solutions, you will be responsible for leading the implementation process, ensuring adherence to best practices, optimizing performance, and managing risks throughout the project.
   

  

 The AWS Professional Services organization is a global team of experts that help customers realize their desired business outcomes when using the AWS Cloud. We work together with customer teams and the AWS Partner Network (APN) to execute enterprise cloud computing initiatives. Our team provides assistance through a collection of offerings which help customers achieve specific outcomes related to enterprise cloud adoption. We also deliver focused guidance through our global specialty practices, which cover a variety of solutions, technologies, and industries.
   

  

 Key job responsibilities
   

  

 As an experienced technology professional, you will be responsible for:
   

  

* Designing and implementing complex, scalable, and secure AWS solutions tailored to customer needs
* Providing technical guidance and troubleshooting support throughout project delivery
* Collaborating with stakeholders to gather requirements and propose effective migration strategies
* Acting as a trusted advisor to customers on industry trends and emerging technologies
* Sharing knowledge within the organization through mentoring, training, and creating reusable artifacts


**About The Team**
 Diverse Experiences: AWS values diverse experiences. Even if you do not meet all of the preferred qualifications and skills listed in the job below, we encourage candidates to apply. If your career is just starting, hasn’t followed a traditional path, or includes alternative experiences, don’t let it stop you from applying.
   

  

 Why AWS? Amazon Web Services (AWS) is the world’s most comprehensive and broadly adopted cloud platform. We pioneered cloud computing and never stopped innovating — that’s why customers from the most successful startups to Global 500 companies trust our robust suite of products and services to power their businesses.
   

  

 Inclusive Team Culture - Here at AWS, it’s in our nature to learn and be curious. Our employee-led affinity groups foster a culture of inclusion that empower us to be proud of our differences. Ongoing events and learning experiences, including our Conversations on Race and Ethnicity (CORE) and AmazeCon (gender diversity) conferences, inspire us to never stop embracing our uniqueness.
   

  

 Mentorship & Career Growth - We’re continuously raising our performance bar as we strive to become Earth’s Best Employer. That’s why you’ll find endless knowledge-sharing, mentorship and other career-advancing resources here to help you develop into a better-rounded professional.
   

  

 Work/Life Balance - We value work-life harmony. Achieving success at work should never come at the expense of sacrifices at home, which is why we strive for flexibility as part of our working culture. When we feel supported in the workplace and at home, there’s nothing we can’t achieve in the cloud.
   

  

**Basic Qualifications**
* Experience in cloud architecture and implementation.
* Strong database experience
* Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Engineering, related field, or equivalent experience
* Swedish language


**Preferred Qualifications**
* AWS experience preferred, with proficiency in a wide range of AWS services (e.g., EC2, S3, RDS, Lambda, IAM, VPC, CloudFormation)
* AWS Professional level certifications (e.g., Solutions Architect Professional, DevOps Engineer Professional) preferred
* Experience with automation and scripting (e.g., Terraform, Python)
* Knowledge of security and compliance standards (e.g., HIPAA, GDPR)
* Strong communication skills with the ability to explain technical concepts to both technical and non-technical audiences


 Amazon is an equal opportunities employer. We believe passionately that employing a diverse workforce is central to our success. We make recruiting decisions based on your experience and skills. We value your passion to discover, invent, simplify and build. Protecting your privacy and the security of your data is a longstanding top priority for Amazon. Please consult our Privacy Notice (https://www.amazon.jobs/en/privacy\_page) to know more about how we collect, use and transfer the personal data of our candidates.
